title: riot please unban my account its been a month or two and i have been missing the game alot.
body: im really sorry for being salty and flaming  people in the chat. i know banning my account was necessary  but i really learned  my lesson i wont be flaming my team ever again i promise riot just please give me one more chance i really had everything on that account and i was climbing up in ranked. please guys give me 1 more chance.... please......
